name: Cyberpunk 2088
description:
Well, fine. I may have lied to you, but hey, the real treasure is the friendships we made along the way... Oh, in case you didn't get it, this is a tribute to the Stanley Parable demo, they made the same joke like 7 years ago and it still never gets old!

You can actually buy the REAL game here: https://store.steampowered.com/agecheck/app/1091500/
